explains: adj. 葡萄牙的；葡萄牙人的；葡萄牙语的；葡萄牙文化的
n. 葡萄牙语；葡萄牙人

sentences.en: Contemporary photographs are juxtaposed with a sixteenth century, copper Portuguese mirror.
sentences.cn: 把当代的照片与一面16世纪的葡萄牙铜镜摆放在一起。

sentences.en: Camping is a great way to meet the locals as the Portuguese themselves are enthusiastic campers.
sentences.cn: 野营是与当地居民接触的好途径，因为葡萄牙人本身就是热情的露营者。

sentences.en: When he misses home, there are several Brazilian restaurants where he can go and speak Portuguese, his native language.
sentences.cn: 当他想家的时候，他可以去几家巴西餐馆，说他的母语葡萄牙语。
